title: General Physics IA
description: Fundamental principles of mechanics. Vectors, particle kinematics. Equilibrium of a rigid body. Work and energy, linear momentum, rotational kinematics and dynamics. Primarily for engineering and science students. Not open to students with credit in PHYS 131. 4 lectures. Crosslisted as HNRS 134/PHYS 141. Fulfills GE B3.
prerequisites: MATH 141 with grade C- or better and MATH 142 or MATH 182 (or concurrent enrollment)
